description: Primes the sum of eight consecutive composite numbers.
mathematica: composite[ n_Integer ] := (k = n + PrimePi[ n ] + 1; While[ k - PrimePi[ k ] - 1 != n, k++ ]; k); a = {}; Do[ p = Sum[ composite[ n + k ], {k, 0, 7} ]; If[ PrimeQ[ p ], a = Append[ a, p ] ], {n, 1, 600} ]; a
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Mar 30 2001
